Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Maximize \Max"i*mize\, v. t. [L. maximus greatest.] To increase to the highest degree. --Bentham. [1913 Webster]
maximize v 1: make as big or large as possible; "Maximize your profits!" [syn: {maximise}] [ant: {minimize}, {minimize}] 2: make the most of; "He maximized his role" [syn: {maximise}]
